description: Gamba's high-waisted hiking pants are a must for any outdoor enthusiast. They offer added protection against cold drafts, allowing you to enjoy your outdoor activities without fear of Mother Nature's whims. Thanks to their lightweight stretch nylon fabric, these pants adjust perfectly to your every move while wicking away moisture. Whether you're climbing rocks, hiking trails, or relaxing in the great outdoors, these pants provide freedom and comfort.
name: Gamba II Pants - Womens
